# onlineornot_user (Data Source)

Look up a user by email or ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `email` (String) The user's email address. Provide either id or email.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the user. Provide either id or email.

### Read-Only

- `first_name` (String) The user's first name
- `image` (String) URL to the user's avatar image
- `last_name` (String) The user's last name
- `role` (String) The role of the user in the organisation (ADMIN or STANDARD)
